show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: September 27, 2010
content:
Dr. Breggin opens his first show with the basic principles of good therapy and a critique of psychiatric drugs.  He then visits with Doug Bower, PhD who is a licensed professional counselor, a registered nurse, and a United Methodist minister.
  Dr Bower brings a wealth of experience to understanding empathic counseling and life skills.
